forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low around 0C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 6C. Winds ENE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 43F. Winds ENE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 44F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 42F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
